description: Opens with shots of Mercenary (in cloak) from the anime opening, and Zero leaving the cave. There are voice overs of both Zero and Mercenary over scenes of them forming their contract. Final scene is them touching thumbs to seal the contract, followed by the book closing and broadcast info. (http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=kr_8ZXgzGT8 [http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=kr_8ZXgzGT8])
